name: the apocalypse, but make it fashion. ✨

content.html: Just a thought, but maybe it’s time to start recognizing ableist jokes for the acts of violence they are. It wasn’t “just a bad joke.” It was an act of violence against a woman with an autoimmune disorder, perpetrated on a stage with an international audience.
content.value:
Just a thought, but maybe it’s time to start recognizing ableist jokes for the acts of violence they are.

It wasn’t “just a bad joke.”

It was an act of violence against a woman with an autoimmune disorder, perpetrated on a stage with an international audience.
